conbody.p: If the acquisition is for real property appraisal services estimated to cost $25,000 or more and is not exempt under FAR 5.202 or GSAR 505.202, then the contracting officer must publicize the proposed acquisition in FedBizOpps. (Note: See partÂ 570 for information regarding publicizing contracts actions for leasehold interests in real property.)
